inclusion.criterion: Irritable bowel syndrome with predominant diarrhoea as defined by the ROME III criteria and with symptoms of abdominal bloating
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: IBS symptom score > 3 on at least 2 subscores (abdominal discomfort, abdominal bloating, abdominal pain, urgency, stool frequency, stool consistency)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: normal screening protocol which includes screening for infectious diseases (eg. blood HIV, Syphilis, Hepatitis B or C; stool: enteropathogens, clostridium, ESBL, CPE)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: predominant constipation as defined by Rome III criteria
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: pregnancy or inadequate anti conception for the duration of the trial
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has symptoms of dizziness, severe diarrhea, and abdominal pain. He has a history of living in a camp in Sudan for a month and recently returned from an international trip.
